error.desc: An unexpected error occurred while subscribing. Please try again later.

success.title: Blog Created
success.desc: Your blog has been created successfully. Our team will review it shortly.

submit_success.title: Success
submit_success.desc: Your form answers have been submitted successfully.

submit_error.title: Unexpected Error
submit_error.desc: An unexpected error occurred while submitting your form answers. Please try again later.

fetch_error.title: Unexpected Error
fetch_error.desc: Unexpected error while fetching form data

sent.title: Message Sent!
sent.desc: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

schema.name: Name must be at least 2 characters.
schema.email: Please enter a valid email address.
schema.subject: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
schema.message: Message must be at least 10 characters.

error.title: Not Authenticated
error.desc: Please log in to view your profile.

404.title: Not Found
404.description: Requested resource could not be found.

23514.title: Validation Error
23514.description: The submitted data does not meet validation criteria.

23502.title: Missing Required Data
23502.description: Some required fields are missing or incomplete.

23505.title: Duplicate Entry
23505.description: This item has already been submitted.

22001.title: Input Too Long
22001.description: One or more values exceed the allowed length.

42601.title: Invalid Input Format
42601.description: The submitted data has an invalid format.

42501.title: Access Denied
42501.description: You do not have permission to perform this action.
